db:abstract.db:para: The Qt XML module provides C++ implementations of the SAX and DOM standards for XML.

db:article.db:para: Note that the module will not receive additional features anymore. For reading or writing XML documents iteratively (SAX), we recommend using Qt Core's QXmlStreamReader and QXmlStreamWriter classes. The classes are both easier to use and more compliant with the XML standard.
